div.head: 小便遺精
div.div: minor relief with loss of essence; urination with loss of semen

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: minor relief with loss of essence; urination with loss of semen

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with xiao bian jing chu 小便精出 , urination with emission of essence . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry lian ou 蓮藕 quotes Yi lin ji yao 醫林集要 : 小便遺精：蓮子心一撮，為末， 入辰砂一分，每服一錢，白湯下，日二 , “For urination with loss of semen : Take of lian zi xin the amount one can hold with three fingers and prepare a powder. Add chen sha , 1 fen . Each dose is 1 qian . Ingest with clear boiled water. Twice a day”.
